ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] how to get external links only 1 hop and still get the whole domain within 20 hops
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Kris Unfortunately it does not work with alsoCheckVia = true. The external links are not accepted by the SurtPrefixedDecideRule. The example external link
